firstNightReminder: Point to two players, neither of which is the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

otherNightReminder: The Acrobat points to a player. If that player is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat dies.
name: Acrobat
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are drunk or poisoned, you die.

name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

otherNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the 'Mad' reminder and the second with the '2nd' reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked 'Mad'. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Harpy token, then point to the player marked '2nd'. Put the player marked 'Mad' to sleep.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a not-in-play good character. Put the Boffin to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Boffin token, then the not-in-play good character token. Place this second character token by the Demon character token. Put the Demon to sleep.
name: Boffin
ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character. That character, if in play, dies. If that character is not in play, choose zero, one, or more players to die.
name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

firstNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player and a Minion character. Replace that player's token with that Minion token. Repeat until the normal number of Minions exist.
otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

firstNightReminder: While setting up the game, remove all Minion tokens and add Townsfolk or Outsider tokens. Wake the appropriate number of players directly clockwise and anti-clockwise from the Lord Of Typhon. Show each of these players a unique Minion token, and give a thumbs down. Replace these players' good character tokens with these Minion tokens and put these players to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.
name: Lord Of Typhon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are sat in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outisders]
